name: firebase
description: - Firestore: Configure security rules and indexes files for Firestore - Functions: Configure a Cloud Functions directory and its files - Storage: Configure a security rules file for Cloud Storage - Emulators: Set up local emulators for Firebase products   - Authentication Emulator   - Functions Emulator   - Firestore Emulator   - Storage Emulator   - Emulator UI - Remote Config: Configure a template file for Remote Config
